live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to stabilize and fully restore all services.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35271.summary: Some customers in Summerland and and surrounding areas (such as Trout Creek & Cresant Beach) may be experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35271.title: March 23 – Summerland (and surrounding areas) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
